Football fans cheer for hard hits all the time, and if the Bears were facing the Eagles, virtually every Bears fan would have joined Buehrle in hoping that Michael Vick got viciously hit. As James Harrison said, I don't want to injure anybody... I try to hurt people. In football, football fans root for players to get hurt. Football players try to inflict hurt. I'd find it easier to censure Buehrle if football's hypocrisy on pain weren't so transparent. Report
